item.title: Dimension reduction using PCA and GPLVM for Simulated Cylinder and Real Handwritten Digits
item.description: Dimensionality Reduction will be performed using PCA and GPLVM on a Simulated Cylinder and on a Real Handwritten Digits set (MNIST) in order to test the performances of the two techniques. This has been my thesis project for my bachelorâ€™s degree. Click on the PDF button above to download the complete project. This has been my thesis project for my bachelor’s degree. Download the PDF of the complete project.
